definition: trade war
Shang Dynasty (c. 1600-1046 BC)/surname Shang
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to fight/fight/war/battle

sentences.english: You need to show some grit if you want to succeed in the tough world of business.
sentences.chinese: 你要是想在殘酷商戰中勝出的話，就得拿出點勇氣來。

sentences.english: The Neimoidian life-cycle has contributed much to their cutthroat business acumen.
sentences.chinese: 內莫迪亞人把一生的大部分時間都獻給了殘酷的商戰。

sentences.english: "Comercial Fight" was the center of his economical thoughts which was very practical.
sentences.chinese: “商戰”是他經濟思想的核心，充滿濃厚的實踐色彩。
